channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - communication

item.title: Sometimes I forget how important communication is
item.description: Free software (and documentation) developers don't always have all the time they want. Instead, they grab whatever time they have to do what they believe is the most productive - be it documentation editing, programming, updating ebuilds, SELinux policy improvements and what not. But they often don't take the time to â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
